<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Manages a passive (i.e., listening) UNIX domain socket</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The ListeningSocket class encapsulates a UNIX domain socket that can listen</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and accept incoming connections. ListeningSocket is portable and supports</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Windows builds begining with Insider Build 17063 ListeningSocket is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// designed for server-side operations, working alongside \\p raw&#95;socket&#95;streams</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that function as client connections.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Usage example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code&#123;.cpp&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// std::string Path = &quot;/path/to/socket&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Expected&lt;ListeningSocket&gt; S = ListeningSocket::createUnix(Path);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if (S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;raw&#95;socket&#95;stream&gt;&gt; connection = S-&gt;accept();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///   if (connection) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///     // Use the accepted raw&#95;socket&#95;stream for communication.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/listeningsocket"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ListeningSocket &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::atomic&lt;int&gt; FD;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If a separate thread calls ListeningSocket::shutdown, the ListeningSocket</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// file descriptor (FD) could be closed while ::poll is waiting for it to be</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// After the construction of the ListeningSocket, shutdown is signal safe if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it is called during the lifetime of the object. shutdown can be called</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Accepts an incoming connection on the listening socket. This method can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// optionally either block until a connection is available or timeout after a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// specified amount of time has passed. By default the method will block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// until the socket has recieved a connection. If the accept timesout this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// method will return std::errc:timed&#95;out</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Timeout An optional timeout duration in milliseconds. Setting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Timeout to a negative number causes ::accept to block indefinitely</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;raw&#95;socket&#95;stream&gt;</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/listeningsocket/#ac080084a7f9f9a2d530621e41a309967">accept</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Attempt to read from the raw&#95;socket&#95;stream&#39;s file descriptor.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This method can optionally either block until data is read or an error has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// occurred or timeout after a specified amount of time has passed. By</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// default the method will block until the socket has read data or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// encountered an error. If the read times out this method will return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// std::errc:timed&#95;out</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Ptr The start of the buffer that will hold any read data</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Size The number of bytes to be read</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Timeout An optional timeout duration in milliseconds</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-socket-stream/#af22cc7ec55d3e7b68bf83856ed991f0e">read</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::chrono::milliseconds &amp;Timeout = std::chrono::milliseconds(-1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
